title: American Promise
description: Filmmakers Joe Brewster and Mich√®le Stephenson follow their son and his best friend through the U.S. educational system. Though both boys start out at the prestigious Dalton School, circumstances later force one into a public high school.
summary: Filmmakers follow their son and his best friend through 12 years in the U.S. educational system.
